lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Braves made another move in the dramatic offseason retooling of their rotation on Thursday by acquiring left-hander Jaime Garcia from the St. Louis Cardinals.

headline.print_headline: Cardinals Send LHP Jaime Garcia to Braves for 3 Prospects
headline.main: Cardinals Send LHP Jaime Garcia to Braves for 3 Prospects

snippet: The Atlanta Braves made another move in the dramatic offseason retooling of their rotation on Thursday by acquiring left-hander Jaime Garcia from the St. Louis Cardinals....
